test.name: Performing ssh audit

kw.name: Test Ssh Audit
kw.msg: ${ssh_audit_status} = (3, "The audit has failed {'(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp256': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp384': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp521': '[fail] using w...

kw.name: Pass Execution
kw.doc: Skips rest of the current test, setup, or teardown with PASS status.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
kw.msg: The audit has failed {'(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp256': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp384': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp521': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(key) ssh-rsa (3072-bit)': '[fail] using weak hashing algorithm', '(key) ecdsa-sha2-nistp256 ': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves'}

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

test.status: The audit has failed {'(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp256': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp384': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(kex) ecdh-sha2-nistp521': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves', '(key) ssh-rsa (3072-bit)': '[fail] using weak hashing algorithm', '(key) ecdsa-sha2-nistp256 ': '[fail] using weak elliptic curves'}
